snippet: Anwar Saad was a fierce nationalist and a deeply conservative Muslim. So his relatives were flummoxed at the notion that he could have killed five at a police training center before being fatally shot.
abstract: Rampage by Jordanian nationalist Anwar Saad, in which he shot to death five people including two Americans at police training center in Amman, shakes country, as well as his family; Saad, who was conservative Muslim, was fatally shot by police.
lead_paragraph: Anwar Saad was a fierce nationalist and a deeply conservative Muslim. So his relatives were flummoxed at the notion that he could have killed five at a police training center before being fatally shot.

headline.main: Rampage by a Soldier Known for Loyalty Shakes Jordan, and a Family
headline.print_headline: Rampage by a Soldier Known for Loyalty Shakes Jordan, and a Family

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
